/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the soft glow that would light up the street as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a calm, sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, casting soft shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene.
